title: Did Isaac Newton have a mental disorder? - Quora

response.answer_text: None that I have read of yet he is a man who was very much consoled to “God “ and made very good use of his time in the conditions of his era. I have read that he was a survivor of a black plague of Europe and while his professors left university he stayed in his dorm room and was not being taught therefore he began thinking and created the process of calculus and other mathematical processes for calculating the movement of the planets. To be extreme in any field is to have a form of neurosis yet when productivity is the result with logical application the neurosis is one of recognition and benefit. Remember! All through the ages that it appears that it is the heretic that made religion more palatable….
